title: Samadhani Platform
des: I built a web platform called Samadhani, which provides a streamlined solution for conflict resolution and feedback management. The platform allows users to submit grievances and track responses in a structured and transparent way.
tech: React, JavaScript, CSS, React-Router, Node , Express, Mongodb

keypoints.text: Built using React.js for the frontend.
Developed my own HTTP server , wrote crud api, regex , Used Express JS and Monodb
Developed and Deployed the HTTP Server
Use Carousel and loading components for frontend and Used bunch of react and Js library and made Responsive For All Devices

title: Paardarshi
des: I built a web portal called Paardarshi for my village. It is a transparent medium that helps donors verify and check their donated money authentically. A fun fact about this project is that I built it entirely on YouTube live.
tech: React, JavaScript, CSS, React-Router, Node , Express, Mongodb

keypoints.text: Built using React.js.
Features include searching, sorting, receipt printing, and WhatsApp shareable receipts.
Add Certificate Generation Feature and Added funcationality Of Download in Jpg, Responsive Design
Backend developed with Node.js and Express.js.

title: React E-commerce Webapp
des: I built a web app in March 2023 when there was a great rush for React and JavaScript. Fortunately, due to my JavaScript skills, I was able to complete this web app in 5 days before the peak of the React and JavaScript rush.

keypoints.text: Used React-Router and Owl Carousel.
Functionality: Add to cart, checkout page, and various React hooks.
Used JavaScript libraries like Fabric.js and Image Carousel.
Backend developed with Node.js, Express.js, and JavaScript.

title: React-ChatRoom-Frontend
des: This project was assigned to me during an interview in July 2023 for a startup. I got shortlisted, but due to academic commitments, I didn't accept the offer.

keypoints.text: Built frontend using CSS and JavaScript.

title: Kissan
des: It was a simple startup I built back in the day. For scaling, I used various web scraping techniques and built a WhatsApp bulk sender using WBM. I received many responses, but unfortunately, I had to shut it down.

keypoints.text: Built frontend using CSS and JavaScript.
Integrated a WhatsApp API for data transmission.
Developed a fully functional official site.

title: Ppassport
des: I built a business that helps people get their passport photos using their ID. It is currently active.

keypoints.text: Built Using , HTML, CSS, PHP, MYSQLDB
Developed Interface for both Interface , image Upload, Image Fetch
used Php to connect to MYSQL database , Design the Database Scheme, Perfomred data upload and data Fetching
Key funcationality :- Image Upload , Image Fetching

title: Certificate Generator
des: I built a platform for my village temple where the main aim was to market and collect donations by generating certificates. The idea was to encourage people to put these certificates as their WhatsApp status to create social 'FOMO' in the community.

keypoints.text: Built using React.js.
Features include searching, sorting, receipt printing, and WhatsApp shareable receipts.
Used MongoDB for storing donor details.
Backend developed with Node.js and Express.js.

title: Nawnit Studio Prints
des: This project built my confidence. When I was 16, during the first wave of COVID-19 in the second week of the 21-day quarantine, I started this project. From then until August 2020, I worked on building multiple registration forms, integrating MySQL with PHP, and setting up payment gateways.

keypoints.text: Built using JavaScript.
Features include image uploads, payment gateways, and user suggestions.
Used MongoDB for storing donor details.
Backend developed with Node.js and Express.js.

title: OFFLINE
des: A boredom project I worked on for fun.

keypoints.text: Built using React.js.
Features include searching, sorting, receipt printing, and WhatsApp shareable receipts.
Used MongoDB for storing donor details.
Backend developed with Node.js and Express.js.
